entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle or flurries early this evening. A few rain showers or flurries beginning early this evening then changing to flurries late this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the morning then steady. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. POP 30%
